item.description:
Hello Canucks,

Well it's almost December and that must mean one thing... time for our Annual Christmas party. In past years we've done it with the Aussies but no word from them yet. We'll be going to Kings once again this year for some Pool and Bowling. We'll meet in the bar area and then get the games going.

Hope you can make it.

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting by the bar

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: 3rd Annual Canadian Expat Christmas Party
